title: Is there much of a market for used electric motorcycles? - Quora

response.answer_text: well, there really isnt one for new electric motorcycles yet, let alone for used ones. electric scooters however, are very popular in many places, and so are used ones.
Based on the number of e-bikes owned by people I personally know that have been stolen, I’d say there has to be. Q: Is there much of a market for used electric motorcycles?
